channel.title: How do i delete report abuse!? please HELP
channel.description: well i want to delete report abuse from my actual server, not client. so if people want to report and they click report abuse nothing happens and the screen dont pop up, i dont want the screen to pop up. please help, i have a devolution source. 7.0

item.title: How do i delete report abuse!? please HELP
item.dc:creator: @lolwut69 lolwut69
item.description:
